titles.title: The Way Of The Cross Leads Home (? not on CD)

properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}The way of the cross leads home The way of the cross leads home It is sweet to know as I onward go The way of the cross leads home{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I must needs go home By the way of the cross There's no other way but this I shall ne'er get sight Of the Gates of Light If the way of the cross I miss{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I must needs go on In the blood sprinkled way The path that the Saviour trod If I ever climb To the heights sublime Where the soul Is at home with God{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Then I bid farewell To the way of the world To walk in it never more For my Lord says "Come" And I seek my home Where He waits at the open door{/lang-eng}
